snippet: Bill Flemming, president of Skanska USA Building, likes to conclude a meeting by asking participants how they will act upon the decisions it produced.
abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office column features interview with Skanska USA Building president Bill Flemming discussing his career and management technique.
lead_paragraph: Bill Flemming, president of Skanska USA Building, likes to conclude a meeting by asking participants how they will act upon the decisions it produced.

headline.print_headline: Before the Meeting Adjourns, Tell Me What You’ll Do Next
headline.seo: Bill Flemming of Skanska USA Building, on Leadership
headline.main: Before the Meeting Adjourns, Tell Me What You’ll Do Next
